p.k: Apple needs to find a funny formula that will land him a comedic role in a movie. / Apple and Onion try to finish a story before the book disappears forever. / Onion worries his relationship with Apple is in jeopardy when a stray cat enters the picture. / When Falafel decides to pack up and leave the city, Apple and Onion have to convince him to stay or they'll have to leave too. / Onion's fear of crowds threatens his basketball team's success.
